basic.description: This course is a concentrated study of the assessment, evaluation and design of cardiovascular program development for the competitive athlete including those with selected medical conditions or concerns. This course meets specific guidelines and competencies for strength and conditioning           professionals.
basic.subject: PET
basic.title: Cardiovascular Program Development for Competitive Athletes and Sport

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: Admitted to the Sports Sciences Major of the MS in Exercise Science or instructor permission.
